long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Datarate is a powerful browser extension that lets you rate, save, and organize web pages, paragraphs, or images with ease. Powered by AI, it organizes your content and suggests relevant links to enrich your knowledge. Share privately with friends or contribute to the community. Datarate combines smart content management and collaboration for a seamless, connected experience.
